line.originaltext: 1 (9 inch) deep dish frozen pie crust
4 eggs
1 cup heavy cream
1/2 teaspoon salt
1/2 teaspoon black pepper
3 dashes hot pepper sauce (e.g. Tabasco™), or to taste
line.annotation: create_ing(ing14, "3 dashes hot pepper sauce (e.g. Tabasco™), or to taste")

line.originaltext: 1 cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese
1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese
1 (8 ounce) package imitation crabmeat, flaked
1 green onion, chopped
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Bake the pie crust for about 10 minutes, until just starting to brown.
line.annotation: cook(ing9, t1, ing19, "baked pie crust", "10 minutes, until just starting to brown")

line.originaltext: Bake the pie crust for about 10 minutes, until just starting to brown.
Remove from the oven, and allow to cool.
Remove from the oven, and allow to cool.
In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs, cream, salt, pepper, and hot sauce.
In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs, cream, salt, pepper, and hot sauce.
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing11, ing12, ing13, ing14}, ing20, "egg combo", "whisk")

line.originaltext: In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs, cream, salt, pepper, and hot sauce.
Stir in shredded cheese, onion and imitation crab.
line.annotation: combine({ing15, ing16, ing17, ing18, ing21}, ing22, "filling", "stir in")

line.originaltext: Pour into the pie shell.
line.annotation: combine({ing19, ing22}, ing23, "unbaked quiche", "pour into pie shell")

line.originaltext: Bake for 25 to 30 minutes in the preheated oven, then turn off the oven, but leave the door closed.
line.annotation: cook(ing23, t1, ing24, "half baked quiche", "25 to 30 minutes")

line.originaltext: Bake for 25 to 30 minutes in the preheated oven, then turn off the oven, but leave the door closed.
Leave quiche in the oven for an additional 20 to 30 minutes until firm.
Leave quiche in the oven for an additional 20 to 30 minutes until firm.
